page.title: 03Home Life
page.content: Home life --------- We are awakened by bell on alarm clock or digital buzzing clock. Most beds have lightweight duvet covers, either feather or polyester filling. the house has most electrical gadgets, a freezer, fridge, small microwave oven, kettle,toaster,dishwasher, iron,vacuum cleaner and electric cooker. many houses have gas cookers as well as gas fires and gas boilers or oil for their central heating of which many houses now consider essential for modern living. In the bathroom, shwers and toilet bidets are usual, as well as electric shavers and electric toothbrushes. The preparation of food in the kitchen is made easy with the use of food mixers, saucepans, frying pans and kitchen tools made of non-
